about_the_game:
The Ultimate Upgrade contains all the same content as the Core version of the Fantasy Grounds VTT, but it allows you to host games for players without requiring those players to own a license of their own.

This DLC will create a new license key that you can use to unlock the Ultimate version. Update your license key and select 'Check for Updates' to complete your upgrade.
detailed_description:
The Ultimate Upgrade contains all the same content as the Core version of the Fantasy Grounds VTT, but it allows you to host games for players without requiring those players to own a license of their own.

This DLC will create a new license key that you can use to unlock the Ultimate version. Update your license key and select 'Check for Updates' to complete your upgrade.
legal_notice: Fantasy Grounds is copyright SmiteWorks USA LLC, 2004-2021. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord and for dice sounds.
  • Additional Notes: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord and for dice sounds.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor (SSE2 instruction set support)
  • Memory: 20 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord and for dice sounds.
  • Additional Notes: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord and for dice sounds.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13+
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

short_description: The Ultimate Upgrade contains all the same content as the Core version of the Fantasy Grounds VTT, but it allows you to host games for players without requiring those players to own a license of their own.
